            <string language="hu-HU">Burgonya zöld szára</string>
            <string language="en-US">Green stem of the potato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grüner Stamm der Kartoffel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tige verte de la pomme de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Haste verde da batata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gambo verde della patata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πράσινος μίσχος της πατάτας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vástago verde de la patata</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A burgonya föld feletti lágy szára</string>
            <string language="en-US">Soft stem of the potato above the surface of soil</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weicher Stamm der Kartoffel über der Oberfläche
des Bodens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tige molle de la pomme de terre au-dessus de la 
surface du sol</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Haste macia da batata acima da superfície do 
solo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gambo molle della patata sopra la superficie di 
terreno</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαλακός μίσχος της πατάτας επάνω από την επιφάνεια 
του χώματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vástago suave de la patata sobre la superficie 
del suelo</string>
          </description>
